title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Military Targets in Lebanon: A Comprehensive Report on Today’s Offensive Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Launch sites, terror infrastructures, and military buildings; The IDF attacked a series of military targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory.

Air Force combat aircraft attacked earlier today a series of military targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory. Among the targets attacked were launch sites, military buildings, and terror infrastructures of the Hezbollah terror organization. The IDF also attacked using aircraft and attack helicopters of the Air Force, tanks and artillery fire, military infrastructures of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory.

In addition, the IDF attacked earlier today with artillery fire several areas in Lebanese territory.

Earlier today, several launches were identified towards the areas of Dovev, Avivim, and Har Dov, the IDF attacked the sources of fire with artillery. In addition, several launches were identified towards the Arab al-Aramsha area, the rockets did not cross into Israeli territory, Air Force aircraft attacked the cell that carried out the shooting.

Following earlier alerts today about the intrusion of hostile aircraft in the north of the country, the Air Control Unit identified several aerial targets that crossed from Lebanese territory into Israeli territory. During the event, an interceptor was launched and the event ended.

Documentation from the attacks is attached: https://bit.ly/41tRqxX
